unnormalised: Flipkart-achea Big Billion Days sale-ant transaction-anchem प्रमाण वाडलें, ani poile-anchem andaz-an pachlea vorsha-peksha 30% vadh zal'li ditha. Fuddlea datya-an dakhoita ki fakt poilea 12 horan-ant 1.2 million-anche transaction proccess kele. Platform-an 2:00 AM-ak peak traffic report kelo, mobile phones, fashion, ani home appliances uttam vikre zale.
normalised: Flipkart-achea Big Billion Days sell-ant transaction-anchea-nt vadh dislo, ani survatiche andaz dakhoita ki pichlea vorsha-than tis tuke vadh asa. Survatichi mahiti suchoita ki fokot poile bara voram-ni ek point don million transaction process kele. Platform-an don shunya shunya A-M-ak peak traffic-achi nond keli, mobile phone, fashion ani ghara-ntlleo vostu vaprunche vostu-nchea vikar-anchea-nt poilea sthanar asleo.

unnormalised: Amazon-achem Great Indian Festival-ui suru zalam, tashench trend dista. Company-achea bhitar-lea sources-an sanglam ki Prime members-ank ekskluziv favo mell'lo, ani mhunn vikren vadh zal'lo. Amazon-an 25% vadh novi customer registration-achea ant ditha, ani Tier 2 ani Tier 3 shahar-ank mahatvache zaiye asa. Average order value ₹2,500, he andaz-peksha thode uch zaith.
normalised: Amazon-acho Great Indian Festival-ui shuru zalo, tea-ch pori-che trend disun aile. Company-antle sodya-nichi mahiti ughod zalo ki Prime members-ani exclusive poili access ghetli, jea-chea-karnan order-anchi sankhya vadhli. Amazon-ak pachis tuke novi customer registration-achi vadh disli, ani Tier don ani Tier tin shara-ni hi vadh jalak mahatvachi madat keli. Average order-achi kimmat rupee don hazar panch she rupye nond zali, je andaz-apek tho-di chodd asli.

unnormalised: Industry analysts online shopping-achea vadhi-k pent-up demand ani aggressive discounting strategies-ank mhunn sangtha. "Discounts asohai soddun dita. Hanvem navin TV ₹15,000 kamathi vikti ghetla," Rakesh Sharma, Delhi-chea shopper-an sanglo. Flipkart ani Amazon-che ekthain vikri ₹40,000 crore zait mhunn sangtha.
normalised: Industry analyst-an online shopping-antli vadh pent up demand ani aggressive discounting strategies-ak deta. "Discount akashya karnache asa. Hanv ek nov T-V pandra hazar rupee sadharan kimat peksha kami kimat-an ghetlem," Rakesh Sharma, Delhi-chi shopper-an sangli. Flipkart ani Amazon-achi ekatr vikri utsavache saison-ant challis hazar crore rupye-ak paavchi andaz asa.

unnormalised: Pun, kaim shoppers-an delayed deliveries ani out-of-stock products-achea babtin problem report kelo. Social media complaint-anin bharla, jeve kaim deals wegim pois zatheli. "Hanvem washing machine cart-an taklem, pun zave hanvem check out kelo, te pois zaiye gelem!" Priya Iyer-en tweet kelo. He thoda dush-preran, e-commerce giants lakhonn India-achea customers-ak uttam shopping experience divank zaito asa.
normalised: Pan, kadieka shopper-an ukir-ani udelayil-lea deliveries ani stock-ant na-atleo vostu-nchi takrar keli. Social media specific deals jaldich gayab jalea-nchea takrar-ani pur ayali. "Hanv ek washing machine mhojea cart-ant ghatlem, pan jea vellar hanv check out kelem, te gayab zalem!" Priya Iyer-an tweet kelem. Hea sadhya-she hiccups asunakai, e-commerce giants Bharat-antlea millions-an customer-ak smooth shopping experience div-chea-karnan confident asa.
